metadata.title: USN-7171-1 -- PHPUnit vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that PHPUnit incorrectly handled web requests if exposed to the internet. An attacker could possibly use this issue to achive remote code execution or obtain sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7171-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  phpunit - 5.1.3-1+ubuntu3+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
